ing.item: Instant tea with sugar and lemon

directions.step: Combine all ingredients, stirring well. Store mix in an airtight container To serve, place 3 to 4 teaspoons mix in a cup. Add 1 cup boilin water, and stir well. Yield: about 25 servings.NOTE: Keep Instant Spiced Tea Mix on hand to stir up when guests drop in during the winter. It's a tasty warmer-upper, and it makes your kitchen smell good, too. For a thoughtful gift, package Instant Spiced Tea Mix in an attractive container labeled with mixing instructions.
